NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
SOLANUM: Before I depart, Bells: Ilex and I had a question regarding the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> here at the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge.</color>
2
1 SOLANUM: Ilex has kindly provided his eyes at the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> during my pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon today.
3
1
SOLANUM: However, he was curious why we were instructed to use the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin,</color> instead of the one here on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow!</color>
4 3
BELLS: It pleases me greatly to see you both pondering such a question, Solanum.. That is the mark of a curious mind!
5
4
BELLS: You see, unlike the locator on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin,</color> the locator here on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> is built underground to protect its delicate sensors from meteor impacts.
6
5
BELLS: With much of the sky is obscured at this site, it is much more difficult to track the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> using this locator.
7
4
BELLS: With a clear view of the sky, the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> allows one to easily use the rule of quantum imaging from afar.
8
7
SOLANUM: I see.. But Bells, what purpose does the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> here serve then?
9
8
BELLS: To allow me to know when you have safely reached your destination, my dear pupil.
10
9
BELLS: Now, it is time to depart for your pilgrimage at last, Solanum. Ilex is providing you a set of eyes on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin;</color> you musn't keep him waiting too long!
BH_QML EX1 6
BH_QML EX2 2
BH_QML EX3 6
BH_QML EX4 7
BH_QML R4 3
